headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Beware of The Gooch
content:
Crime certainly spikes around the holidays: everyoneâ€™s flush with gifted cash, after all.

So, beware of The Gooch, a nefarious opportunist now roaming the streets and lurking in the shadows, looking to empty the pockets of unsuspecting players while causing grievous bodily harm.

Successfully fight off a surprise attack from this assailant before they strip you of your valuables to earn a little GTA$ bonus and The Gooch Mask.
